pageContext.claim: “So Crazy to watch Senator Blumenthal of Connecticut lecture all on morals & ethics when for 25 years he said he was a Great War Hero in Vietnam, and he was never even there. He lied & cheated right up until the day he got caught. Thank you to those in military who turned him in!”
pageContext.analysis: Sen. Richard Blumenthal (D-Conn.) on a few occasions before his first Senate race in 2010 said or implied he had served in Vietnam, when he hadn't. But Trump seems to have fabricated a bunch of anecdotes and statements that Blumenthal never uttered. It was not 12 years, Blumenthal never described himself as a war hero and never talked about any near-death battles.
